idea:
As the name suggests, Cooklingo means the language of cooking! We provide everything at Cooklingo, from freshly sourced (local oriented) ingredients to easy-to-follow recipes. All our ingredients are perfectly proportioned and are pre-prepped

(pre-chopped and pre-marinated). All a customer has to do is follow our recipe step by step and voila, their meal will be ready within minutes.


The core concept of Cooklingo is to provide convenience in cooking by providing fresh ingredients in a pre-prepped manner and delivering them right at customers’ doorstep. "Delivering fresh ingredients and recipes right at your doorstep" is our mantra!


We also aim to take utmost care in maintaining hygiene and cleanliness and help people combat COVID-19 by providing them “Sanitized Wet Wipes” to be used before and after cooking. All these ingredients are delivered in an eco-friendly packaging that can be reused to store food. We have e-recipes that we share with our customers that make our company 100% paperless.
name: Cooklingo

idea:
“CRYSTAL COOLING SOLUTIONS’’ specializes in the provision of design, installation, commissioning and after-care services for all types of air conditioning, ventilation systems for the commercial, retail and leisure business sectors. Our dynamic team of qualified skilled personnel is ready to set new standards in the field of Air-conditioning -Installation and Services.

“CCS’’ have locate at Mumbai-Kurla since 1st Jan 2019.In this small period “CCS” become a highly professionally managed company providing complete Air-conditioning solutions to the various segments ranging from residential projects, commercial projects to major projects like that Classes, Hotels, Commercial Offices, Shops, industrial Area’setc.

“CCS’’ today is powerful, action packed, dedicated team of professionals handling services and installations with a great vision and urge to become one of the best companies in the field of air-conditioning. Our technicians are all fully equipped, with proper tools and experience to diagnose and troubleshoot your problems accurately. All our technicians are required to undergo our own in-house training before they are deployed to service our customer. We also have 24-hour EMERGENCY Commercial Service in case of breakdowns along with comprehensive maintenance programs.

Our Services

1) AMC Services

2) Repair Services

3) Installation Services

About staff

In Mumbai -In total “CCS’’have sufficient qualified back office staff & approximately more than 15 field engineers for the handle installations & Services. They have sufficient Power Tools to work professionally.

Our strength is providing customized solutions to the total satisfaction of our customers giving them a feel of value for their money.

“CCS” has work with all leading brands in Air-conditioners. Over a period “CCS” has successfully installed and maintained more than 2000 units till date covering the entire range of Daikin, O General, Voltas, Onida, Videocon, Blue Star, Carrier etc.

Founder

1) Mr. Nilkant Waghmare.

Qualified Air Conditioner Engineer from Daikin Air conditioning India Pvt.Ltd.

Finally, “CRYSTAL COOLING SOLUTIONS” is the best option for the all types of Air conditioners & air conditioning business solution.
name: Crystal Cooling Solutions
